name: AppMenu

methods.name: setAppVisibility
methods.signature: public static void setAppVisibility(Id appMenuItemId, Boolean isVisible)
methods.description: Shows or hides specific apps in the App Launcher.

params.name: isVisible
params.description: The 15-character application ID value for an app. For more information, see the ApplicationId field for AppMenuItem or the AppMenuItemId field for UserAppMenuItem in the SOAP API Developer Guide  If true, the app is visible.

methods.name: setOrgSortOrder
methods.description: Sets the organization-wide default sort order for the App Launcher based on a List of app menu item IDs in the desired order.

params.name: appIds
params.description: A list of application ID values. For more information, see the ApplicationId field for AppMenuItem in the SOAP API Developer Guide.

methods.name: setUserSortOrder
methods.description: Sets an individual userâ€™s default sort order for the App Launcher based on a List of app menu item IDs in the desired order.

params.name: appIds
params.description: A list of application ID values. For more information, see the AppMenuItemId field for UserAppMenuItem in the SOAP API Developer Guide.

description: Contains methods to set the appearance of apps in the App Launcher.
